scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='src/assets';const dest='lib/assets';if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dest,f)));console.log('Assets copiados exitosamente');}else{console.log('No hay carpeta assets');}"
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
